response.original_title: Shoot my Heart, My Mafia Boss
response.overview: When the ruthless mafia boss Sable crosses paths with Daymond, a compassionate and determined doctor, their lives collide in an unexpected journey of obsession and unlikely affection. What begins as a tense power struggle slowly evolves into mutual respect. Together, they take on their enemiesâ€”and in the process, discover a love neither of them saw coming.
response.title: Shoot my Heart, My Mafia Boss
